Package lapr.project.graph.matrix

Interface BasicGraph<V,​E>

All Known Implementing Classes:
AdjacencyMatrixGraph
public interface BasicGraph<V,​E>
Author:
DEI-ESINF

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.Iterable<E> edges()
    Returns the actual edges of the model.graph
    V[] endVertices​(E edge)
    Returns the vertices of edge as an array of length two.
    E getEdge​(V va, V vb)
    Returns the edge between two vertices
    java.lang.Iterable<E> incomingEdges​(V vertex)
    Returns an iterable collection of edges for which vertex v is the destination.
    int inDegree​(V vertex)
    Returns the number of edges reaching vertex This is the same result returned by outDegree
    boolean insertEdge​(V va, V vb, E newEdge)
    Inserts a new edge between two vertices
    boolean insertVertex​(V newVertex)
    Inserts a new vertex with the given element.
    int numEdges()
    Returns the number of edges in the model.graph
    int numVertices()
    Returns the number of vertices in the model.graph
    int outDegree​(V vertex)
    Returns the number of edges leaving vertex This is the same result returned by inDegree
    java.lang.Iterable<E> outgoingEdges​(V vertex)
    Returns an iterable collection of edges for which vertex is the origin.
    E removeEdge​(V va, V vb)
    Removes the edge between two vertices
    boolean removeVertex​(V vertex)
    Removes a vertex and all its incoming/outgoing edges from the model.graph.
    java.lang.Iterable<V> vertices()
    Returns the actual vertices of the model.graph

  • Method Details

    • numVertices

      int numVertices()
      Returns the number of vertices in the model.graph
      Returns:
      number of vertices of the model.graph

    • numEdges

      int numEdges()
      Returns the number of edges in the model.graph
      Returns:
      number of edges of the model.graph

    • vertices

      java.lang.Iterable<V> vertices()
      Returns the actual vertices of the model.graph
      Returns:
      an iterable collection of vertices

    • edges

      java.lang.Iterable<E> edges()
      Returns the actual edges of the model.graph
      Returns:
      an iterable collection of all edges

    • outDegree

      int outDegree​(V vertex)
      Returns the number of edges leaving vertex This is the same result returned by inDegree
      Parameters:
      the - vertex
      Returns:
      number of edges leaving vertex v, -1 if vertex does not exist in the model.graph

    • inDegree

      int inDegree​(V vertex)
      Returns the number of edges reaching vertex This is the same result returned by outDegree
      Parameters:
      the - vertex
      Returns:
      number of edges reaching vertex v, -1 if vertex does not exist in the model.graph

    • outgoingEdges

      java.lang.Iterable<E> outgoingEdges​(V vertex)
      Returns an iterable collection of edges for which vertex is the origin. This is the same result as returned by incomingEdges.
      Parameters:
      the - vertex
      Returns:
      collection of edges leaving vertex, null if vertex does not exist in the model.graph

    • incomingEdges

      java.lang.Iterable<E> incomingEdges​(V vertex)
      Returns an iterable collection of edges for which vertex v is the destination. This is the same result as returned by incomingEdges.
      Parameters:
      the - vertex
      Returns:
      collection of edges reaching vertex, null if vertex does not exist in the model.graph

    • getEdge

      E getEdge​(V va, V vb)
      Returns the edge between two vertices
      Parameters:
      the - two vertices
      Returns:
      the edge or null if source and dest are not adjacent or do not exist in the model.graph.

    • endVertices

      V[] endVertices​(E edge)
      Returns the vertices of edge as an array of length two.
      Parameters:
      the - edge
      Returns:
      array of two vertices or null if edge does not exist in the model.graph.

    • insertVertex

      boolean insertVertex​(V newVertex)
      Inserts a new vertex with the given element.
      Parameters:
      the - vertex contents
      Returns:
      false if vertex exists

    • insertEdge

      boolean insertEdge​(V va, V vb, E newEdge)
      Inserts a new edge between two vertices
      Parameters:
      the - two vertices and the new edge contents
      Returns:
      false if either vertices are not in the model.graph or an edge already exists between the two.

    • removeVertex

      boolean removeVertex​(V vertex)
      Removes a vertex and all its incoming/outgoing edges from the model.graph.
      Parameters:
      the - vertex
      Returns:
      false if vertex does not exist in the model.graph

    • removeEdge

      E removeEdge​(V va, V vb)
      Removes the edge between two vertices
      Parameters:
      the - two vertices
      Returns:
      the edge or null if vertices are not in the model.graph or not connected
